p: The cytotoxicity activity of carnosol ( 1) has been determined in vitro against A-549 (human lung carcinoma), HeLa (human carcinoma of the cervix), HEp-2 (human carcinoma of the larynx), and MCF-7 (human breast adenocarcinoma) cell lines, and against a Vero (African green monkey kidney) cell line [ 46].
